title: Stupid Newbie Question #2,343,602,887... (MS Volt)
content: Okay, I'm trying to work with MS Volt to help on working the Open Type subs, etc; but so far the only thing I've found remotely resembling an instruction manual is the 60-minute training video that has so far put me to sleep repeatedly. Does anyone know if there's an actual instruction manual or something approaching that? Any help would be appreciated, thanks.
author: Megami

comments.content:
Of possible interest:

[http://www.microsoft.com/typography/VOLT%20and%20InDesign/default.mspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203104206/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/VOLT%20and%20InDesign/default.mspx "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/VOLT%20and%20InDesign/default.mspx")

[http://www.microsoft.com/typography/SpecificationsOverview.mspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203104206/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/SpecificationsOverview.mspx "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/SpecificationsOverview.mspx") (see "Script-specific Development" section on the right; not quite VOLT tutorials but they do reference and assume the use of VOLT)
